name: Starship In Peril WowieJam4
description:
Made for Wowie Jam 4. Your ships AI wakes you up to deal with a problem.

My first game jam, and my first finished game.

Short first person shooter game with a little story. 

Recycled a little bit of old code, modified a picture from Textures.com (made it tileable, fixed some issues on it, generated normal map, changed the color). used a picture of a gun from Unsplash.com for the guns texture. I made the model of the ship on the menu a couple years ago. Used this free font: https://www.fontspace.com/edge-of-the-galaxy-font-f45748 Used amplify animation pack https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/animations/amplify-animation-pack-20791...

 Everything else was made from scratch during the jam time.

It could use some polish still, but you can win, you can lose, the story is all there.

My windows computer is broken, so I cannot test the windows build. Please let me know if you have any issues.
